entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Guysborough
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:05 AM AST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Tracadie 09:00 AM AST Friday 03 March 2023

Humidity: 94 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -5.4°C
Wind: NNW 32 km/h gust 44 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending this morning then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow this morning. Amount 10 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast early this morning. Wind becoming north 40 gusting to 60 early this morning then northwest 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 13 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 16 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 03 March 2023
